editorialNotes.short: Make striking effects you thought you could only get with a DSLR.
editorialNotes.tagline: Capture the world in slow motion

editorialNotes.short: Advanced features for a pro experience.

ios.subtitle: U can't not love our VHS look!

editorialNotes.standard: With exclusive film-inspired filters and powerful manual controls, this simple video camera transforms everyday footage into a masterpiece.

editorialNotes.short: Capture your best moments like a pro.

editorialNotes.standard: The start of golden hour is no longer a guessing game thanks to Lumy. This simple but elegant tool helps maximize your time, tracking information for sunrise, sunset, and more across all your devices.
editorialNotes.short: Find the best time for taking the perfect shot.

name: TV Cast Pro for LG webOS

editorialNotes.short: Expert-level photo tools with an intuitive interface.
A little help for your pics.

name: TV Cast Pro for Sony TV

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Who do you want to be today?
Send your screen to any device

editorialNotes.standard: This incredible filtering tool will have you looking old-timey in no time. Hipstamatic’s awesome app is truly like nothing we’ve ever seen, transforming portraits into photographs that look hundreds of years old. Plus, thanks to a Photos app extension, you can edit pics right from your library.

editorialNotes.short: Add stylised fonts that meld into your image.

name: VHS Video Cam - VCR Retro Cam

ios.subtitle: The night and low light camera

editorialNotes.short: A perfect app for taking pictures in low-light environments.

editorialNotes.standard: Shooting movies on film may be a dying art, but just because we live in the digital age doesn’t mean we have to abandon our analog past. We get warm, nostalgic fuzzies from 8mm Vintage Camera’s grainy, flickery film filters and lens effects, conjuring up memories of vacation travelogues screened in wood-paneled basements. It’s not just about old-school kicks, though—this powerful suite of tools can give any video an authentic period look.
editorialNotes.short: The easy way to create authentic vintage movies.

editorialNotes.standard: Wherever you are on your filmmaking journey, this multitrack video editor meets you there. Its features are rarely found in an iPad app, and everything’s accessible through an intuitive touch interface.
editorialNotes.short: Apply transitions, effects and more with these powerful editing tools.

ios.subtitle: Your own paint by numbers kits

editorialNotes.short: Transform ordinary photos into creative comics.

name: KnockOut HD Pro-Photo Editor
artistName: Shenzhen Qianhai Happy Tour Network Technology Co., Ltd.

editorialNotes.short: Night mode, filters, face recognition, AR support and more.

name: TV Cast Pro for Samsung TV

editorialNotes.standard: Create professional-looking photos with minimal effort, thanks to Camera+’s excellent manual controls for shooting, plus dozens of filters, frames, and tweaks to help perfect each shot. From adjusting your workflow to syncing your pictures to iCloud, Camera+’s features have been meticulously crafted, refined, and innovated throughout the years.

editorialNotes.short: A photo booth in your pocket.

name: TV Cast Pro for Fire TV

editorialNotes.standard: With a suite of powerful tools, touch-screen controls, gorgeous templates, and customizable effects, this full-featured editor is in a class of its own. Plus, with iCloud Drive, you can edit on your iPhone, iPad, or Mac, wherever you are.
editorialNotes.short: Make your pictures shine with this set of photography tools.

ios.requiredCapabilitiesForRealityDevice: accelerometer arm64 gyroscope location-services magnetometer video-camera
